title: You know I wrote 3,700 words yesterday in about 4 hours.
body:
And here I am thinking about how, extremely often, I struggle to even get 500 words out in one day.

Like, motivation, why must it work this way?

I mean, do you guys experience this often? Because I'm trying to get a novel done here and that 3,700 words I have no idea where it came from but I'd have loved for it to happen far more often than what has been happening before yet, my motivation, just doesn't work that way, and I don't really know why, because if I pressure myself to do it then my work is crap yet if I don't pressure myself at all I get barely anything on the page, it's just weird.
